mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review_board (bno, member_code, reservation_code, hotel_code, room_code,content, grade) VALUES (REVIEW_BOARD_SEQ.nextval, #{memberCode}, #{reservationCode}, #{hotelCode}, #{roomCode}, #{content}, #{grade} )
mapper.select: SELECT rb.*, m.name FROM review_board rb LEFT JOIN members m ON rb.member_code = m.member_code ORDER BY rb.bno DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE review_board SET content = #{content}, modify_date = sysdate WHERE bno = #{bno}
mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER_CODE FROM review_board WHERE BNO = #{bno}
